name: Krono Crashers
description:
A small group of youths created a paradox when traveling with the stolen time machine of one of their parents, and now, to save the world they have to get back in time and fight across a completely broken timeline to fix what they screwed up. Enjoy the frenetic melee-based combat, explore the random-generated level, get new upgrades and find your way to the next level.

This small demo is the result of a final degree project where I worked as game designer and programmer. The project is cancelled and would not go any further. However, it is still possible for me to be updating it in the future, fixing some bugs and adding music and sound effects.

You can find much more info in my webpage:
https://sergiolucasserrano.wixsite.com/website/krono-crashers

Feel free to play it and let me know your thoughts!

Controls WASDMovementMouse left clickAttack
Mouses right clickDashSpace BarSpecial Ability
